text: Now a family of four! Brooklyn Decker and Andy Roddick, have welcomed their second child together, a baby girl, Us Weekly can confirm. Celebrity Babies of 2017 The couple welcomed their baby girl, Stevie, in Austin, Texas in late November. Decker, 30, revealed the news in an Instagram post on Wednesday, January 3. “ A newborn, a toddler, a dog in a cone, a dog with a tumor but I ’ m having a good hair day so it ’ s fine we ’ re fine I ’ m fine, ” the model wrote alongside a photo of herself cradling the infant. The 35 - year - old former tennis pro announced that the couple were expecting their second bundle of joy while being inducted into the International Tennis Hall of Fame in Newport, Rhode Island, in July.
